Detailed Description

PMIP PACKet CAPture (PCAP)

Function Documentation

void pmip_pcap_loop ( char *  devname,
int  iif 
)
Parameters:
[in] devname The name of the device (ex "eth1") that will be listened for capturing packets.
[in] iif The interface identifier that will be listened for capturing packets.
void pmip_pcap_msg_handler_associate ( struct in6_addr  mn_iidP,
int  iifP 
)

Construct amessage event telling that a mobile node is associated with the radio technology of the MAG, and send it to the MAG FSM.

Parameters:
[in] mn_iidP The MAC address of the mobile node.
[in] iifP The interface identifier that is listened for capturing packets.
void pmip_pcap_msg_handler_deassociate ( struct in6_addr  mn_iidP,
int  iifP 
)

Construct amessage event telling that a mobile node is de-associated with the radio technology of the MAG, and send it to the MAG FSM.

Parameters:
[in] mn_iidP The MAC address of the mobile node.
[in] iifP The interface identifier that is listened for capturing packets.
